alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 1:56PM MDT until June 07 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 156 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Black Hawk, or 4 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rapid City around 210 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base and Box Elder. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 51 and 68. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
